content: living on the west coast of canada our family spends a lot of time on the beach summer or winter rain or shine winter driftwood was inspired by the interlacing driftwood found on the beach during a january storm in tofino made of 100% wool this cute slightly pointed hat will keep your little beachcomber warm and protected from the winter winds and damp rains as you search for wild treasures this project is a quick knit and a great stash-buster using approximately 50+ grams of bulky yarn/ thick aran yarn great for beginners who are comfortable with or would like to try knit and purls knitting in the round and decreasing by k2tog for updates on my latest patterns pattern give-aways and other fun things check out my facebook page wolf & faun knits 1 1 https //www facebook com/pages/wolf-faun-knits/535025203260365
